Class FunctionContext

codeContext.InnerContext

  • Constructor Details

    • FunctionContext

      public FunctionContext(InnerContext baseFirstInnerContext, long originalStartPosition, long originalEndPosition, String functionName, boolean useTypes, String returnType, boolean isExported)
      Creates the function code context
      Parameters:
      baseFirstInnerContext - - the actually processed/parent inner context
      originalStartPosition - - the start position of the function in the application AST
      originalEndPosition - - the end position of the function in the application AST
      functionName - - the name of the function
      useTypes - - information if the types are used - true if types are used otherwise not
      returnType - - the return type of the function, which object is returned to extend it further
      isExported - - information if whole class is exported, true if whole class is exported otherwise false

    • FunctionContext

      public FunctionContext(InnerContext baseFirstInnerContext, long originalStartPosition, long originalEndPosition, UsedVariables upperInnerContextParameters, UsedVariables upperInnerContextVariables, String functionName, UsedVariables upperInnerContextMembers, boolean useTypes, String returnType, boolean isExported)
      Creates the function code context
      Parameters:
      baseFirstInnerContext - - the actually processed/parent inner context
      originalStartPosition - - the start position of the function in the application AST
      originalEndPosition - - the end position of the function in the application AST
      upperInnerContextParameters - - the parameters accessible from the upper contexts
      upperInnerContextVariables - - the variables declared in upper contexts
      functionName - - the name of the function
      upperInnerContextMembers - - the local function variables
      useTypes - - information if the types are used - true if types are used otherwise not
      returnType - - the return type of the function, which object is returned to extend it further
      isExported - - information if whole class is exported, true if whole class is exported otherwise false

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public void addMember(org.json.simple.JSONObject partOfVariable, org.json.simple.JSONObject astRoot, String variableName, boolean isDirectlyExported)
      Adds class member to function variables
      Parameters:
      partOfVariable - - the part AST that contains the variable
      astRoot - - the root of application AST
      variableName - - the name of the variable
      isDirectlyExported - - information if member is directly exported, true if variable is directly exported otherwise false

    • getFunctionName

      public String getFunctionName()
      Returns the function name
      Returns:
      the name of the function

    • insertAllInstantiations

      public ContextOptions insertAllInstantiations(String baseExecutable, InnerContext actualContext)
      Returns context options based only this function context
      Overrides:
      insertAllInstantiations in class InnerContext
      Parameters:
      baseExecutable - - the base executable expression - callable form, if none then callable form will be created
      actualContext - - the actual processed context
      Returns:
      the empty context option representation

    • createDescriptiveJSON

      Returns and creates the descriptive JSON represented output from information about the function context
      Overrides:
      createDescriptiveJSON in class InnerContext
      Parameters:
      globalContext - - global context - accessible in all places (such as variables declared as var in JavaScript)
      Returns:
      the descriptive JSON represented output from information about the function context
